title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate double-breasted frock coat with single row of braid denoting the rank of lieutenant] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate double-breasted frock coat with single row of braid denoting the rank of lieutenant] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 10.5 x 8.3 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 2-68. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Purchased from: The Horse Soldier, Gettysburg, Pa., 2011. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
